Description: All stored data must be encrypted using AES-256 or equivalent
Third-party security audit and pen testing
Automated CVE scanning for all dependencies
Static and dynamic application security testing
Payment card industry compliance (if processing payments)
Standard OAuth flows for third-party apps
Secure tokens with proper expiration and rotation
Scoped API keys with rotation capability
Log all auth events with IP/device info
Complete audit log of resource access
Restore to any point within retention window
Recovery time and point objectives defined
